forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers during the morning giving way to periods of light rain this afternoon. High 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers during the morning giving way to periods of light rain this afternoon. High 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 9C. W winds shifting to S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low around 50F. W winds shifting to S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
